channel.title: Need help! (667) How to change the name of the client and so on?
channel.description:
Ok, So I'm using the NRS client, Or whatever you call it and I can't find out how to change the name of the client aswell as the other stuff on the client.
Can anybody help? It's a 667 client.

item.title: Need help! (667) How to change the name of the client and so on?
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

do you even try to look…? go client sided and go to settings.java change all the names to the name of your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! (667) How to change the name of the client and so on?
